00039 #include "CmdInsertShape.h"
00040 #include "SceneModel.h"
00041 #include "TShape.h"
00042 #include "TShapeKit.h"
00043 #include "tgf.h"
00044 
00050 CmdInsertShape::CmdInsertShape( TShapeKit* shapeKit, TShape* shape, SceneModel* model, QUndoCommand * parent )
00051 : QUndoCommand("InsertShape", parent), m_shapeKit(shapeKit), m_shape(shape), m_pModel( model ), m_row( -1 )
00052 {
00053         if( m_shapeKit == 0 ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdInsertShape called with NULL TShapeKit*" );
00054         if( m_shape == 0 ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdInsertShape called with NULL TShape*" );
00055         m_shape->ref();
00056 }
00057 
00061 CmdInsertShape::~CmdInsertShape()
00062 {
00063         m_shape->unref();
00064 }
00065 
00070 void CmdInsertShape::undo()
00071 {
00072         m_shapeKit->setPart( "shape", NULL );
00073         m_pModel->RemoveCoinNode( m_row, *m_shapeKit );
00074 }
00075 
00080 void CmdInsertShape::redo( )
00081 {
00082         m_shapeKit->setPart( "shape", m_shape );
00083     m_row = m_pModel->InsertCoinNode( *m_shape, *m_shapeKit );
00084 }
